name: Frosty Coots
description:
Alice was having a fun day one the Swedish slopes when she heard a soft meow of a cat. When she went to investigate she found that it was streamer Ludwig Ahgren's cute cat Coots (or was it Cracker). She had been scattered into 10 pieces and strew all over the mountain. Can Allace gather them all to save the stranded Coots. Make crazy jumps! Collect 10 unique images of Coots for reasons! And most of all, Have fun!

Credits:
HDeDeDe - Project Director, Programmer, Level Design
NOONE - Sprites, Music, SFX, VA, Level Design
Ryrurwaiter - Background Art

OST -

GitHub page - https://github.com/HDeDeDe/frostyCoots

Note - Mac (Both x86_64 and arm64) and Linux (x86_64 only) versions will be uploaded after the jam ends.
